about.heading: About Me
about.description: A developer with a passion for building and learning.
about.text: I'm a full-stack developer with more than a year of experience creating real-world applications using modern web technologies. I'm interested in how systems are structured, enjoy working on code quality, and aim to bring ideas to life through clean and reliable solutions. I’m constantly improving my skills — whether through personal projects, open-source work, or exploring new tools and frameworks.
